name: Horse's Back
description: The path slowly fades into the sands, which grow higher and higher. Eventually you reach the highest point in the dunes. A lone signpost informs you that you are standing on the Horse's Back sand dune. From here you can see a large sandy fortress ahead.

name: Sunajo Fortress
description: The sandy walls guard a relatively large inner complex. As the only real point of civilization in this part of the desert, the fortress acts as a trade hub and rest stop for merchants from the east and west.

name: Toad Ranch
description: A few dusty buildings surround a pen filled with toads. The fencing is quite short compared to the creatures they guard, but the toads don't seem interested in leaving.

name: Turru Cenopa
description: As you reach the summit of the mountain, you find a caldera. Beyond to the east the desert gives way to grasslands, and you can just barely see a tower in the far distance.
